about.title: About Me
about.text-1: Hello! My name is Dao Vinh Khang, born in 2004, and I graduated from FPT Polytechnic College with a major in Web Development.
about.text-2: Currently, I am seeking an Intern/Fresher Front-End Developer position to gain opportunities to learn, practice, and improve my knowledge and professional skills.
about.text-3: In the next 1–2 years, my goal is to advance to a Junior Front-End Developer role, focusing on strengthening my technical capabilities, adapting to a real working environment, and accumulating experience through practical projects.
about.text-4: After that, I plan to learn Back-End development to expand my understanding of systems, improve myself, and gradually move toward becoming a Full-Stack Developer.
about.text-5: In the long term, I aim to become a Senior Front-End Developer (or Full-Stack Developer), capable of building high-quality products and contributing sustainable value to businesses.
about.text-6: A few things about myself: I am a cheerful, sociable person who is always eager to learn new things. I aspire to work in a professional environment where I can apply what I have learned, develop practical skills, and actively contribute to the overall growth of the team and the company.

elecking.name: Elecking website
elecking.description:
This is an e-commerce website specializing in selling electronic products, fully integrating features such as searching, filtering, sorting products, shopping cart and online payment via VNPAY.
Users can register, log in, recover passwords, update personal information, address and password, and are assigned permissions according to roles to ensure security. The system supports order management, applying discount codes and tracking delivery status.
The administrator (Admin) has access to the monthly and yearly statistical dashboard, and performs management operations (CRUD) on data tables such as products, orders, categories, users, brands, etc. to ensure effective system operation and management.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: An overview of my learning journey and skill development in web development.

description.text-1: During my internship, I had the opportunity to work in a professional Front-End development environment and gain exposure to team-based product development processes. I became familiar with task assignment, requirements discussion, and collaboration with team members to efficiently complete assigned tasks.
description.text-2: I was guided through various stages of the Front-End development process, including requirements analysis, user interface development, and supporting the refinement of application features by working with experienced developers.
description.text-3: I improved my teamwork skills, problem-solving thinking, and gained a deeper understanding of the web application development process in a professional business environment.

vieclamsanxuat.name: Vieclamsanxuat

description.text-1: During my internship, I worked remotely, focusing on assigned Front-End tasks through an online work management and communication system (Slack). I proactively received requests, communicated with team members, and regularly reported on progress to ensure work was completed on time.
description.text-2: Working remotely helped me improve my self-learning abilities, time management skills, and problem-solving skills. Simultaneously, I honed my professional communication skills in an online environment and adapted to a distributed workflow, which differed significantly from working in an office.

education.title: Education
education.description: An overview of my learning and development journey in the field of web development.

fpoly.text-1: During my studies, I have built a solid foundation in Front-End web development, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Figma, along with modern libraries and frameworks such as React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and Ant Design. I use Git for source code management and effective collaboration throughout the development process.
fpoly.text-2: In addition, I have basic knowledge of Back-End technologies such as JSON Server, RESTful APIs, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, which helps me better understand how the Front-End interacts with server-side systems and enables me to build complete web applications.
fpoly.text-3: Throughout my learning journey and project implementations, I frequently use development tools such as Fork, Postman, Docker, GitHub, and GitLab to optimize workflows and improve product deployment efficiency.
fpoly.text-4: Beyond technical skills, I have developed strong logical thinking, self-learning ability, and a high sense of responsibility. I consistently meet deadlines to ensure both academic progress and team schedules, while proactively collaborating with and supporting team members to achieve the best possible outcomes.
